CustomField.formula: IF(Contains("JP:KR:TW:CN:HK:TW:AU:IN:NZ:SG:TH:Rest of Asia", Reporting_Area__c ),"APAC", IF(Contains("AR:BR:CA:CL:MX:US:UY:Rest of Americas", Reporting_Area__c ),"Americas", IF(Contains("AT:Benelux:CH:DE:Eastern Europe:ES:FR:IL:IT:Nordic:Rest of EMEA:TR:UK:ZA", Reporting_Area__c ),"EMEA", "HQ" )))
CustomField.label: Reporting Region
